requirement_designation: Humanities and Arts with Race & Ethnicity(*)
course_description: This course discovers how globalization shaped Latin America and the Caribbean, and how this region shaped globalization, through musical practices. It does not require musical training.
sections: Class Nbr: 4382, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: P. Palomino, Status: Open
